channel.title: Our Services on VISA Specialists | Finer Immigration
channel.description: Recent content in Our Services on VISA Specialists | Finer Immigration

item.title: Appeals
item.description: Introduction Your business can benefit from employing people from overseas if you need skills that are in short supply, or if you want to discover new ideas and technologies. You can also employ workers who are living overseas but want to come work in Australia by either: Sponsoring a worker on a permanent basis: You can sponsor skilled workers for permanent migration through the Employer Nomination Scheme or the Regional Sponsored Migration Scheme (if your business is in regional Australia).
